question: Sophie is required to submit a 28-page essay. She already finished writing 1/4 of the essay. How many pages does she have left to write?
answer:
Sophie has already written 1/4 of the essay which is 28 pages*1/4 = <<28*1/4=7>>7 pages.
So, she still needs to write 28 pages - 7 pages = <<28-7=21>>21 pages.
#### 21
